title: Kian the Brave Tiger
hook: During a moonlit night in the Fora jungle, Kian the tiger faced a puzzling problem. What will he do?
moral: Kindness can overcome misunderstandings and build strong friendships.
paragraphs: In the lush Fora jungle, Kian the tiger was known for his strength and loyalty. One day, as he was strolling by a river, he heard a whimpering sound.
"What's wrong, little monkey?" Kian asked, spotting Amara, the baby monkey, trapped in a hole. "My friends ran off and left me," cried Amara.
Kian knew the mischievous monkeys did not mean harm. He called out to them, "Friends, Amara needs our help!" The monkeys returned, ashamed but apologetic.
Together, they freed Amara, who hugged Kian gratefully. Kian forgave the monkeys, showing that kindness can mend mistakes and bring everyone closer.
keywords: tiger, jungle, loyalty, problem, friendship, forgive, kindness, misunderstanding, solve, mistake

id-en.hook: During a moonlit night in the Fora jungle, Kian the tiger faced a puzzling problem. What will he do?
id-en.moral: Kindness can overcome misunderstandings and build strong friendships.
id-en.title: Kian the Brave Tiger
paragraphs:
In the big Fora forest, Kian the tiger was very strong and always ready to help. One day, while walking near a stream, he heard a sad noise.
Kian saw Amara, the baby monkey, stuck in a hole and asked, "What's the matter, little monkey?" Amara replied, "My friends went away and didn't take me."
Kian knew the naughty monkeys were not trying to be mean. He shouted to them, "Friends, Amara needs our help!" The monkeys came back, feeling sorry but saying sorry.
Together, they helped Amara escape. Amara hugged Kian tightly, saying thank you. Kian forgave the monkeys, proving that being nice can fix problems and make friends.

en-fr.title: Kian le Tigre Courageux
en-fr.moral: La gentillesse peut aider à résoudre les malentendus et créer de belles amitiés.
en-fr.hook: Une nuit éclairée par la lune dans la jungle de Fora, Kian le tigre a rencontré un problème mystérieux. Que fera-t-il ?
paragraphs:
Dans la jungle luxuriante de Fora, Kian le tigre était connu pour sa force et sa loyauté. Un jour, alors qu'il se promenait près d'une rivière, il entendit un son plaintif.
"Qu'est-ce qui ne va pas, petit singe?" demanda Kian, voyant Amara, le bébé singe, coincé dans un trou. "Mes amis sont partis et m'ont laissé," pleura Amara.
Kian savait que les singes espiègles ne voulaient pas faire de mal. Il leur a dit, "Amis, Amara a besoin de notre aide!" Les singes sont revenus, honteux mais désolés.
Ensemble, ils ont libéré Amara, qui a fait un câlin reconnaissant à Kian. Kian a pardonné aux singes, montrant que la gentillesse peut réparer les erreurs et rapprocher tout le monde.

en-pt.title: Kian, o Corajoso Tigre
en-pt.hook: Numa noite iluminada pela lua na selva Fora, o tigre Kian enfrentou um problema confuso. O que ele irá fazer?
en-pt.moral: Bondade pode ajudar a resolver mal-entendidos e construir amizades fortes.
paragraphs:
Na exuberante selva de Fora, o tigre Kian era conhecido por sua força e lealdade. Certo dia, enquanto passeava perto de um rio, ele ouviu um som choramingando.
"O que foi, macaquinho?" perguntou Kian, avistando Amara, o bebê macaco, preso em um buraco. "Meus amigos fugiram e me deixaram sozinho," chorou Amara.
Kian sabia que os macacos traquinas não queriam fazer mal. Ele chamou por eles, "Amigos, Amara precisa da nossa ajuda!" Os macacos voltaram, envergonhados mas pedindo desculpas.
Juntos, eles libertaram Amara, que abraçou Kian agradecida. Kian perdoou os macacos, mostrando que a bondade pode consertar erros e unir todos.

en-de.title: Kian der Tapfere Tiger
en-de.moral: Freundlichkeit kann Missverständnisse überwinden und starke Freundschaften aufbauen.
en-de.hook: An einer Nacht mit vielen Mondlichtern im Dschungel von Fora stand Kim der Tiger vor einem kniffligen Rätsel. Was wird er tun?
paragraphs:
In dem üppigen Fora-Dschungel war Kian der Tiger für seine Stärke und Treue bekannt. Eines Tages, als er am Fluss entlang schlenderte, hörte er ein jämmerliches Geräusch.
"Was ist los, kleiner Affe?" Kian fragte und entdeckte Amara, das Babyäffchen, das in einem Loch feststeckte. "Meine Freunde sind weggelaufen und haben mich allein gelassen", weinte Amara.
Kian wusste, dass die neckischen Affen keinen Schaden wollten. Er rief ihnen zu: "Freunde, Amara braucht unsere Hilfe!" Die Affen kamen zurück, beschämt aber einsichtig.
Zusammen befreiten sie Amara, die Kian dankbar umarmte. Kian vergab den Affen, was zeigt, dass Freundlichkeit Fehler heilen kann und alle näher zusammenbringt.
